field.name: summary
field.value: Indeterministic crashes when creating the NHibernate Mapping.

field.name: description
field.value:
http://forum.castleproject.org/viewtopic.php?p=8583#8583
Find Attached our main project baseline code that exhibits the problem. Dependencies are included.
The problem is easily shown by (after a build of the solution ) running the SchemaTool from the command line without any parameters. Since your test database is likely to be different, the default database connection settings can be easily changed in
Source\BlueLogic.DocuStore.Model\Utilities\DatabaseSection.cs Just change the attribute values to your test database values.
( so you don't have to fiddle around with configuration files )
Ignore the other projects in the solution as those are not relevant to the problem. Thanks for your time !
